00035 class btPairSet: public btAlignedObjectArray<GIM_PAIR>
00036 {
00037 public:
00038         btPairSet()
00039         {
00040                 reserve(32);
00041         }
00042         inline void push_pair(int index1,int index2)
00043         {
00044                 push_back(GIM_PAIR(index1,index2));
00045         }
00046 
00047         inline void push_pair_inv(int index1,int index2)
00048         {
00049                 push_back(GIM_PAIR(index2,index1));
00050         }
00051 };

00066 class btBvhTree
00067 {
00068 protected:
00069         int m_num_nodes;
00070         GIM_BVH_TREE_NODE_ARRAY m_node_array;
00071 protected:
00072         int _sort_and_calc_splitting_index(
00073                 GIM_BVH_DATA_ARRAY & primitive_boxes,
00074                  int startIndex,  int endIndex, int splitAxis);
00075 
00076         int _calc_splitting_axis(GIM_BVH_DATA_ARRAY & primitive_boxes, int startIndex,  int endIndex);
00077 
00078         void _build_sub_tree(GIM_BVH_DATA_ARRAY & primitive_boxes, int startIndex,  int endIndex);
00079 public:
00080         btBvhTree()
00081         {
00082                 m_num_nodes = 0;
00083         }
00084 
00087         void build_tree(GIM_BVH_DATA_ARRAY & primitive_boxes);
00088 
00089         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void clearNodes()
00090         {
00091                 m_node_array.clear();
00092                 m_num_nodes = 0;
00093         }
00094 
00096         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getNodeCount() const
00097         {
00098                 return m_num_nodes;
00099         }
00100 
00102         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isLeafNode(int nodeindex) const
00103         {
00104                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].isLeafNode();
00105         }
00106 
00107         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getNodeData(int nodeindex) const
00108         {
00109                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].getDataIndex();
00110         }
00111 
00112         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void getNodeBound(int nodeindex, btAABB & bound) const
00113         {
00114                 bound = m_node_array[nodeindex].m_bound;
00115         }
00116 
00117         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setNodeBound(int nodeindex, const btAABB & bound)
00118         {
00119                 m_node_array[nodeindex].m_bound = bound;
00120         }
00121 
00122         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getLeftNode(int nodeindex) const
00123         {
00124                 return nodeindex+1;
00125         }
00126 
00127         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getRightNode(int nodeindex) const
00128         {
00129                 if(m_node_array[nodeindex+1].isLeafNode()) return nodeindex+2;
00130                 return nodeindex+1 + m_node_array[nodeindex+1].getEscapeIndex();
00131         }
00132 
00133         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getEscapeNodeIndex(int nodeindex) const
00134         {
00135                 return m_node_array[nodeindex].getEscapeIndex();
00136         }
00137 
00138         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE const GIM_BVH_TREE_NODE * get_node_pointer(int index = 0) const
00139         {
00140                 return &m_node_array[index];
00141         }
00142 
00144 };
